description: Number of set partitions C'_t(n) of {1,2,...,t} into at most n parts, with an even number of elements in each part distinguished by marks and such that no part contains both 1 and t (each unmarked) or both i and i+1 (each unmarked) for some i with 1 <= i < t; triangle C'_t(n), t>=0, 0<=n<=t, read by rows.
